feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: ADS job not free memory
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have a requirement to print a form with more than 15.000 pages.

Offcourse that must be done by background job.

If I try to print more than 1000 pages per job I get an error of adobe memory.

I've tried to split on multiple jobs, but the memory is not release and I get the same adobe memory error.

My code is:

FORM f_print_pdf.

  DATA: lt_dtab_pdf TYPE ty_datatab_pdf_t,
        lv_fname    TYPE funcname.

  DATA(lv_tot_lines) = lines( gt_dtab_pdf ).
  DATA(lv_pag_atual) = CONV i( 1 ).

  CALL FUNCTION 'FP_FUNCTION_MODULE_NAME'
    EXPORTING
      i_name     = CONV fpname( 'ZFI_MAP' )
    IMPORTING
      e_funcname = lv_fname.

  WHILE lv_actual_pag LE lv_total_lines.
    REFRESH lt_dtab_pdf.
    LOOP AT gt_dtab_pdf FROM lv_actual_page TO ( lv_actual_page + 999 )
                        ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<wa_dtab_pdf>).
      APPEND <wa_dtab_pdf> TO lt_dtab_pdf.
    ENDLOOP.

    PERFORM f_print_pdf_pages USING lv_fname
                                    lv_actual_page
                                    lv_total_lines
                                    lt_dtab_pdf.

    ADD 1000 TO lv_actual_page.
  ENDWHILE.

ENDFORM. " F_PRINT_PDF
FORM f_print_pdf_pages  USING pv_fname        TYPE funcname
                              pv_actual_page  TYPE i
                              pv_total_pages  TYPE i
                              pt_dtab_pdf     TYPE ty_datatab_pdf_t.

  DATA: ls_docparams    TYPE sfpdocparams,
        ls_outputparams TYPE sfpoutputparams,
        ls_formoutput   TYPE fpformoutput,
        ls_result       TYPE sfpjoboutput.

    ls_outputparams-nodialog  = 'X'.
    ls_outputparams-preview   = space.
    ls_outputparams-reqnew    = 'X'.
    ls_outputparams-reqfinal  = 'X'.
    ls_outputparams-covtitle  = sy-cprog.
    ls_outputparams-dest      = 'ZLOC'.

  CALL FUNCTION 'FP_JOB_OPEN'
    CHANGING
      ie_outputparams = ls_outputparams
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS          = 99.

  CHECK sy-subrc EQ 0.

  CALL FUNCTION pv_fname
    EXPORTING
      it_datatab        = pt_dtab_pdf
      iv_gjahr          = CONV gjahr( p_gjahr-low )
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS            = 99.

  CALL FUNCTION 'FP_JOB_CLOSE'
    IMPORTING
      e_result = ls_result
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS = 99.

ENDFORM. " F_PRINT_PDF_PAGES

The first time I do the loop it's ok. The second time I got the error: "Out of Memory Exception Stack Trace: com.adobe.ProcessingException".

Any idea why the FP_JOB_CLOSE doesn't clear the memory?

Thank you

entry.content:
I have one requirement in material class and characteristics.

I have created one custom class in ZCL_MDG.

Inside the class I have created custom 2 characteristics :  1. Parent  , 2 Child.

User will enter the value in child manually, but for parent field I want to provide F4 help (the values of f4 help should come from custom table ) .

Can anyone help/ guide  me  regarding this.

SAP Master Data Governance , UI Web Dynpro ABAP ,  Data Management

entry.title: Issue connecting custom form to MES | "Form is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API"
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, and we’re facing an issue when trying to connect a form (in this case, a custom one, but we also tested with standard forms) to a custom plant control system (MES system).

When triggering the process, we get the following error message:

“Form: YY1_PP_ETIQUETAFABRICACION is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API.”

see attached screenshot for details:

Stardard FormCustom Form

 

 

 

 

We would like to understand:

  • Are we possibly using the wrong API for this scenario?

  • Is there a way to adapt or convert the form type so that it can be used?

  • Is this limitation expected for forms of this kind in Public Cloud?

Any insights, documentation links, or experiences with similar cases would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best regards,

ASG.

#S4HANACloud #SAPPublicCloud #SAPForms #ABAPCloud #SAPIntegration #SAPAPI #MESIntegration #SAPBTP #BusinessTechnologyPlatform #FormsService #S4HANA #SAPCommunity

entry.title: Creating a BP (Customer Role) and Associating a Company
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently working on a project where I need to create a Business Partner in SAP and assign the Customer role (ZFLCU0) to it. I have the code working for these parts, but I’m struggling with the last step — associating a company to the Business Partner.

Here is the code I have so far, which is functional:

ls_central-SEARCHTERM1 = customer-name1.
ls_central-PARTNERTYPE = 'GE00'.
APPEND ls_central TO lt_central.

" Create Business Partner
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_BUPA_CREATE_FROM_DATA'
  EXPORTING
    partnercategory = '1'
    centraldata = ls_central
  IMPORTING
    business_partner = lv_bpartner
  TABLES
    return = lt_return.

" Assign Customer Role (ZFLCU0)
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_BUPA_ROLE_ADD'
  EXPORTING
    businesspartner = lv_bpartner
    businesspartnerrole = 'ZFLCU0'
  TABLES
    return = lt_return.

" Commit creation and changes
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
  EXPORTING
    wait = abap_true.

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: How to control PO Output types based on Plant and Storage location in header level?
entry.content:
Hi All, Requirement: While creating a Purchase Order (PO), the system should determine the output type based on the plant + storage location combination (at the header level). That is, for a particular plant and storage location pair, a specific output type should be used; for a different combination, a different output type should be selected.

Can anyone help, how to impliment this condition.

entry.title: File Format and Extension Mismatch Error for Excel Attachment Sent via SAP ABAP (SOST)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We are facing an issue with a custom SAP ABAP program that generates an Excel file and sends it internally via email through the SAP system.


When we check the sent email in SOST, we see the attachment, but trying to open the Excel file results in the following error:

“File format and extension of [filename] don’t match. The file could be corrupted or unsafe. Unless you trust its source, don't open it. Do you want to open it anyway?”

We suspect there might be a problem with how the file is being created or attached in the ABAP code, but we are unsure how to resolve this.


Has anyone encountered this issue before or can suggest best practices for generating and sending Excel files from ABAP to avoid this error?


Any guidance or code examples would be greatly appreciated.


Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Issue with sales order creation
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I have some code in the user exit SAVE_DOCUMENT_PREPARE which is trigerred during sales order creation. In that code, i need to access all the schedule lines for an item so I am using the table XVBEP[] for that. For creating sales order i am using a material for which the confirmed stock is of a future date which means if i create a sales order today with that material, the i have two schedule line that item. the first one being of today's delivery date with 0 confirmed quantity and the other one with future delivery date with the required confirmed quantity.


when i put a break-point in my code piece in the user exit and create a sales order using Tcode va01, then when the break point hits in the debugger, i have two records in the XVBEP[] table. But when I create a sales order from an external system which calls the BAPI BAPI_SALESORDER_CREATEFROMDAT2 and put a break-point at the same spot, then I only got 1 record in the XVBRP[] table in debugger. I don't get the second schedule line with the confirmed quantity. But this sales order is saved by the external system using the BAPI, then it shows two schedule lines in va03. Also, there are no custom enhancements that deleted schedules lines.

Can anyone please help what could be the issue behind getting only one schedule line when sales order is created via external system using bapi?
@Chris1973 @Chuma @junwu @Sandra_Rossi @DonWilliams @Lakshmipathi

entry.title: Can I use custom view entity as Value Help?
entry.content:
Title. I have created a custom view entity which selects from custom table. I'm trying to use it as value help on a specific custom field. However, the value help couldn't be found when selecting for value helps.

I have added the annotations but still no success:

@search.searchable: true
@ObjectModel.dataCategory: #VALUE_HELP
@ObjectModel.usageType: {
serviceQuality: #X
sizeCategory: #S
dataClass: #MIXED
}

entry.title: LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS return nothing
entry.content:
Hello everybody,

I have a issue when i send some filters from MDK app to ABAP Odata. When I check the LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS is blank in ABAP. I think this issue due to MDK send substringof and abap cant not resolve this filter. My filters is like this EntitySet?$top=50&$filter=Lgnum eq '001' and (substringof('ace', Maktx) or substringof('ace', Matnr))

checking LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS 

the filters are arriving in string but these are not transform in LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS.

Testing from gateway client

From MDK, these are sending.

 

Best regards,

Angel Gutierrez

entry.title: HTTP failed: INTERNAL_ERROR in SAP Gateway Client for OData Service
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I'm testing an OData service  in the SAP Gateway Client with the Request URI /sap/opu/odata/sap/.../$format=xml using a GET method. I’m encountering an "HTTP failed: INTERNAL_ERROR" message. The Error Log tab shows no additional details yet.

Could you please help me understand how to resolve this INTERNAL_ERROR?  is this a configuration issue or a system problem?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Ashok

entry.title: How to download ADSP document type from SPOOL (SFP Form) and to send mail as pdf attachment
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Same subject thread doesn't have an answer or resolution. So, creating a new thread instead of commenting or opening the old one. 

My requirement is to merge multiple PDF forms (SFP) of Deliveries into one and to send an email to the recipients.

I am creating the spools using VL71 program to generate the output of deliveries via submit program

TO SAP-SPOOL SPOOL PARAMETERS ls_print_params
                  WITHOUT SPOOL DYNPRO
                  VIA JOB lv_job_name NUMBER lv_job_no
                  AND RETURN. 

I am able to view or getting the spool number but since the document type is ADSP.  I cannot use the the FMs of 'CONVERT_OTFSPOOLJOB_2_PDF'  and 'CONVERT_ABAPSPOOLJOB_2_PDF' , as I understood, the ADSP type data is already in the converted PDF format.

Please help me out with your answers how to convert or send this ASDP data to send an email as a pdf attachment. 

Thanks & Regards,

entry.title: Unable to extend standard Fiori app
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m working on the standard SAP Fiori app F1643A – on SAP S/4HANA 2023 (on-premise S03).
Documentation: https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('F1643A')/S30OP 

The requirement is to display some custom fields that were generated and are already available in the classic ME51N transaction.

However, in the app documentation link above, I couldn’t find the “Extension” tab, does that mean that the app cannot be extended ? or is there another way to enable those fields in this app?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Cannot create a breakpoint in this position Elipse ADT
entry.content:
Hello, I have a small problem in my Eclipse.

A few days ago, I debugged the class ZCL_***_DPC_EXT and didn’t have any problem with that. But today, I tried to do it again, and when I set a breakpoint in the file, this message appears:

Does anybody know how I can solve this problem?

I’ve already tried these options that ChatGPT recommended to me, but none of them worked:

- Clear all breakpoints (Eclipse and SAP GUI).
- End sessions in SM04 and SM12.
- Clear the project cache (Properties → ABAP Development → Clean Cache).
- If it still fails → remove and recreate the project in the workspace.

(It's my first question in this community)

entry.title: Change message type ME175 in ME35K
entry.content:
Hello,

In transaction ME35K, I’m encountering an error message that prevents the cancellation release of a contract due to the document having already been output.
Message: ME175 – “Document has already been outputted (function not possible)”

My requirement is to change this error message into a warning, so that the cancellation is not blocked.

I have already added the message code in OMAS, but it didn’t work.
I also tested several user-exits and BADIs mentioned in forums by setting breakpoints, but the program does not stop at any of them.

Could you please help me identify the correct user-exit or BADI where I can insert my code to change the message type.

Note: I’m working on S/4HANA.

Thank you in advance for your help.
